column5: Any pointers on replacing bearings on a centrepin (Stanton) or any other pins where the bearings are press fit, I have heard placing dry ice will shrink the bearings and allow them to come out easier, any other ideas? would be appreciated.
check floatfishing.net for this I made a post when i changed the ones on my stanton. I used a 9mm or 10mm socket and a vise to take them out. Then hammer and dowel to put the new ones in.
